text:
Any thoughts on responding to Gidge’s name request? Just ignore? Tell him we’re open to a name change, but we were trying to anthropomorphize the system to embody the “mentor” role in a Hero with a Thousand Faces (i.e. _The Hero Meets a Mentor to gain confidence, insight, advice, training, or magical gifts to overcome the
initial fears and face the threshold of the adventure.
A Hero may not wish to rush into a Special World blindly and, therefore, seeks the experience and wisdom
of someone who has been there before. This Mentor has survived to provide the essential lessons and
training needed to better face the Journey’s Tests and Ordeals. The Mentor may be a physical person, or
an object such as a map, a logbook, or hieroglyphics._)
honestly at this stage I’d like to just back burner this
it feel really specific for where we are in the process

unless there is a feeling on their end that the name is going to be blocker in this moving forward, I’d like to actually put together a little time during the project for us work this out in a smart way

Just off a call and catching up on this. I’m with Justin, pending what he means on name. Like if he needs a new codename, I honestly don’t care what we call it. 

Once we launch, I think we need to craft something in a smart way.

Thanks. To frame in a response: Hey Gidge- We agree that we may want to look at a different name for the app, but would like to take a focused approach towards the name (possibly with a workshop) later on in the roadmap. For now, if you need a project codename and want to use something other than Workshop Companion, we don’t have any issues with sidekick :)”
I wonder if we just say the first part…?
this is fairly political of me, but if we start calling it “sidekick” the likelihood that that name sticks is pretty high
like - yes, let’s have naming be part of the process, the end
what do you think?
Sounds good to me! I don’t like the name sidekick at all
me neither
if he’s down to just backburner this until 2017, I’d be happy
I hate sidekick. It doesn’t connect to anything else, which i think is part of the doing it smart aspect.
All that said, i have no idea how they even talk about anything in a brandlab — do they call cubby “cubby” or just a thing that people use?
this feels like slightly more a ‘product’ but could fall into same fate
take the phones, use them. No name
which is actually fine with me
no name is better than a bad name
agreed
for the record, who know’s what happens long term, but while we were there, Tom was into-ing the wall to guests as the “cubby wall"
+1 for no name being better than a bad name
that’s interesting. Was wondering how they handle that
honestly though, I’m not sure the wall needs a name
the mobile device/app might
<!channel>: updated deck is available! <https://docs.google.com/a/uncorkedstudios.com/presentation/d/1CobaCzBp4VYizeWCwfpdApogZQLHCuaxdOM1sw4rJaQ/edit?usp=sharing>

i brought up the fidelity of the storyboards and incorporated feedback and extra notes. i archived all the old storyboards in an appendix so that we can reference them for review. let me know if you have any questions/concerns!
Thanks <@U1172PRDX>!

Looks great! Added a few comments. At a high-level, ope  to the team whether we want to denote where effort resides on the admin/bl facilitator side since we’ve determined they are equal audience as BL attendees
It looks fantastic <@U1172PRDX>
oh wow. Just looking, but yes!

yeah - looks really good. I made a few updates to the copy and a couple suggestions. One thing we should keep in mind: in this specific case of BrandLab we should probably refer to “users” as “guests” since that’s their vernacular. I went through and tried to change this throughout, but someone should probably double check.
i’ll take a spin through as well!
just caught one more instance of “user” <@U0260V4K1> <@U0B9N0HF0> i responded to notes on pages 5 and 12. i wouldn’t necessarily call them resolved so let me know if you want to chat about them more.
i resolved any notes that were taken care of
Thanks!
I have to head home to the pup but I'm available via text for changes! <tel:503-550-0424|503-550-0424>
Or call
Or carrier pigeon
